ygData.subject: Re: Third book doesn't make sence...
ygData.msgSnippet: Animated Bait 1 cork 1 spricket I didn t see that one posted anywhere. Firewater 1 bottle of water 1 gnomish spirits Tell me which tinkering book that formula
ygData.messageBody:
Animated Bait
1 cork
1 spricket

I didn't see that one posted anywhere.

Firewater
1 bottle of water
1 gnomish spirits

Tell me which tinkering book that formula is posted in?

Now these may not be in a third book, but don't just give up and call the
grapes sour, little fox.

--- lockjaw <lockjaw@...> wrote:
> If there was a third book, it would seem logical that it would have
> recipies for things in it other than a collapsable fishing pole. So why
> aren't we seeing more tinkered items besides this pole come out of that
> book? Unless all the other formulas in it are broken.
>
> I suspect this is a wild goose chase, and someone, somewhere is having a
> good laugh at our expense.
>
> Rotgut
>
>
<HR>

>


=====
